-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Is a game that teach math table 0 to 12 for children ages 5 to 9. What better 
way to learn that playing a game.

Feature in KidsMath:
Every level consists of 20 questions.
KidsMath as 4 different difficulty level that affect the play time.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Easy 		300 seconds.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Hard		100 seconds.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Extreme	70 seconds.
KidsMath as 5 different choices of operations.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Addition.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Subtraction.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Division.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	Multiplication.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·	All Mix.
After each level the difficulty increase by reducing the game play by 5 
seconds.
KidsMath as a top 10 high score table.

System requirement:
Window Xp, Vista and windows 7.
Windows installer 3.1. If not install the program will install it.
.Net framework 3.5 SP1. If not install the program will install it.

Code available at [url]http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=163[/url]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy!
